channel.title: Progjex-scape - develpoment
channel.description:
well boys and girls, progjex-scape is coming to a end in develpoment. but i still got a month left of coding to do. well i have so much time but lil codes, i need codes... well post here for suggestions and ratings based on pictures...
[center][color=orange]Just now upates 1. added some low level npcs 2. the command ::pnpc added... 3. Low level pcs added... 4.
[center][left]Recent updates[/left] [color=limegreen]1. moved around alot of global objects 2. alot of portals 3. added a training zone 4. pk zone 5. changed portal teleports 6. good attack timer 7. auto restarter[/color][/center]
Future upates [color=blue]1. change npcs on training island 2. add more commands 3. [s]add more shops[/s] 4. move around npcs 5. [s]add drops for new npcs on training island[/s] 6. [b]More low level pcs...[/b] 7. More room to run around on...
[center]Pics of the server. [img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/36193first.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/31298second.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/41093thrid.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/63598second.jpg[/img
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/59052thrid.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/46147fourth.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/49016five.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/32452fifth.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/956107.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/989638.jpg[/img][img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/446769.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.progjex.com/upload/images/5551210.jpg[/img][/center]
[u][b]Any suggestions? And Rate off the pics please[/b][/u][br][size=1]Posted on: April 23, 2007, 04:12:49 PM[/size][hr]ne one? and sorry about the stats and that stuff..its smudgy...
